name: Kill Them All (UnidayStudio)
description:
This game was originally made for the Community Game Jam.  I had no idea how to fit the project with the theme very well, I just made a cool first person shooter.

But! I also added an option for you to add comments in the middle of the map and read other people comment. This way you can put your thoughts about the game or even report bugs. 

NOTE: Please, don't add anything offensive.

And, of course, don't forget to add your comment in the map. :)
